text: lqd kafar min alnasaraa min qal: 'inn allah majmue thlatht ashya': hi alab, walabn, waruh alqds. 'amaa ealim hwla' alnasaraa 'anah lays lilnaas siwaa mebwd wahd, lam yalid walam ywld, wa'iin lam yantah 'ashab hadhih almqalt ean aftrayhm wkdhbhm lyusibannahm eadhab mulim mwje bsbb kufruhum ballh
